name: Veeple
overview:
Veeple is an interactive media company that provides a platform that enables web publishers, advertisers, and individuals to easily add interactive and multi-dimensional content to their videos, creating the opportunity to promote, distribute and monetize their online content through viewer and customer interactions.

Veeple strives to improve interactive video content in the following categories:

Simple and Intuitive Interactivity - Ability to make any object inside a video interactive and place any interactive image into a video, all through a standard web browser, in real-time, by anyone, anywhere, anytime.

Innovative Ad Placement - Dynamic placement of interactive advertisement spots into any video across the internet anywhere.

Relevancy - Ability to make interactive spots extremely relevant for both advertisers and p ublishers through not only contextual analysis of the video but image analysis through our patented image identification technology, ensuring excellent brand protection.

Measurement/Metrics - A deep analytics engine that measures all user-interactions with any video across the interne

As of April 2008, Veeple is partnered with JellyCloud and Soundflavor.

milestones.source_text:
Menlo Park, CA, May 6, 2008 - Veeple, a new leader in In-Stream, Interactive Video
Advertising, and Soundflavor, a leader in On-line Music Search, announced today the
creation of a strategic partnership to bring together interactive music video with
advanced on-line music search.
Every month, millions of people watch music videos on-line. Many of these videos have
had over 25 millions views. However, until today there has been no easy way for a
person viewing a music video to simply click on the video and purchase the song or a
ringtone from the video. Soundflavor and Veeple have created a simple way for
musicians to place interactive actions into their music videos and directly link to a
purchase. Further, the in-stream interactions, what Veeple calls VeeSpots, also allow
viewers to click to a musicianâ€™s web site, iTunes, eBay, MySpace or Facebook.
â€œThe people at Soundflavor are excited to have this cool, new functionality for our
community, said Steve Skrzyniarz, Soundflavorâ€™s CEO and Founder. Steve continued,
â€œThis will let people click directly from a video to our site where they can purchase the
song or a ringtone, or find music playlists that match user preferences.â€
â€œWe hope this new capability will help bring together the community of musicians and
their listeners in such a way that many more people will purchase the music they listen to
on-line. To be able to go from a music video to music purchase is really cool,â€ said Scott
Broomfield, Veepleâ€™s CEO and Co-Founder.
About Soundflavor
Soundflavor, Inc. is a digital music company providing industry-leading music search and
discovery products to both music professionals and consumers. The Companyâ€™s
recommendation technology is based on more than six years of advanced research,
spanning hundreds of genres of music. Its Soundflavor Music Recommendation Engine
powers the Companyâ€™s Soundflavor DJ product and is available for licensing to enable
consumer and commercial music companies to provide their customers with the ability to
discover, sample, and purchase music more efficiently. Soundflavor is based in San
Francisco. For more information, visit www.soundflavor.com
About Veeple
Veeple, Inc. is a new In-Stream, Interactive Video Ad Platform that transforms the way Web Publishers, Advertisers and Video Gurus monetize on-line video. Veepleâ€™s patent pending technology enables people to dynamically interact with in-stream video that is non-intrusive, engaging and relevant. Veepleâ€™s Ad Platform includes cool interactive â€œVeeSpotsâ€, comprehensive video analytics and dynamic in-stream ad/brand insertion capabilities. For more information, visit www.veeple.com

Menlo Park, CA, May 27, 2008 - Veeple, a new leader in In-Stream, Interactive Video
Advertising, and JellyCloud, a Differentiated Ad Network, announced today the creation of
a strategic partnership to add anonymous profiles to Veepleâ€™s Interactive Video Ad
platform database, resulting in creating the ability for advertisers to place targeted,
clickable ads into on-line, in-stream video.
â€œOur JellyCloud database has grown to millions of unique anonymous profiles, which have
been used to deliver highly targeted ads, resulting in yields up to 20x greater than that of
untargeted banner ads,â€ said Scott Eagle, JellyCloudâ€™s COO. Scott continued, â€œWe
believe the ability to provided relevant and targeted ads directly into the video stream is
a huge new opportunity for on-line advertisers.â€
â€œBy adding web behavior to our video analytics engine, we will be able to increase
relevancy in video content, in a non-intrusive, opt-in fashion. As we move from
contextual clickable ads to targeted clickable ads, we will increase interaction rates and
drive to a â€˜best-in-classâ€™ ROI for our partners and advertisers,â€ said Scott Broomfield,
Veepleâ€™s CEO and Co-Founder.
About JellyCloud
JellyCloud, Inc. is a differentiated Ad Network specializing in Behavioral Targeting and
Advanced Web Analytics. For more information, visit www.jellycloud.com
About Veeple
Veeple, Inc. is a new In-Stream, Interactive Video Ad Platform that transforms the way
Web Publishers, Advertisers and Video Gurus monetize on-line video. Veepleâ€™s patent
pending technology enables people to dynamically interact with in-stream video that is

â€œVeeSpots,â€ comprehensive video analytics and dynamic in-stream video ad/brand
